summary: Outraged by Redleg atrocities, the James and Younger Brothers along with Kit Dalton join Quantrill's Raiders and find themselves participating in even worse war crimes.

O'Brien|Edward Peil Sr.|Buddy Roosevelt|George Sowards|Bert Spencer|Jack Tornek|Henry Wills
keywords: jesse james|frank james|james gang|younger brothers|quantrill's raiders
title: Los asaltantes de Kansas
